short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download YouTube thumbnails with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The YouTube Thumbnail Downloader extension allows users to easily download high-resolution thumbnails from YouTube videos. With a single click, users can save the maximum resolution image available for the video they are watching, ensuring they get the best quality possible.

ðŸ”´ How to Use the Extension:
     âœ” Install the Extension
     âœ” Activate on a YouTube Video
     âœ” Download the Thumbnail

ðŸ”´ Features:
The YouTube Thumbnail Downloader extension offers several standout features designed for ease of use and efficiency. With one-click download, users can quickly and effortlessly retrieve thumbnails from YouTube videos. The extension prioritizes high-resolution thumbnails (maxresdefault.jpg) to provide the best quality possible but seamlessly switches to the default resolution if the high-res version is unavailable. It also ensures a tidy file-saving process by cleaning and formatting video titles into readable and valid filenames. Lightweight and intuitive, the extension requires no additional setup, making it both simple and convenient for all users.

ðŸ”´ Disclaimer:
This extension is designed strictly for personal use, and users are responsible for ensuring that their downloads comply with YouTube's Terms of Service and copyright policies. It is important to note that the availability of high-resolution thumbnails is not guaranteed, as it depends on YouTube's offerings; some videos may not have a high-resolution version available. Additionally, the extension is specifically tailored for YouTube video URLs in the format https://www.youtube.com/watch?v= and will not function on other types of pages or links.
